title: Construction Project Manager, Special Projects Group
summary: In RE&D, we don’t sit back and let things happen, we make things happen, and we do this in service to all Apple employees and customers...
description: -  Expertly represent Apple’s interest at all meetings with Consultants, General Contractors, and Suppliers....
key_qualifications: 7-10+ years of construction/project management experience with a demonstrated focus typical technology company project: office TI’s, labs, clean rooms, server labs, tool installations, etc....
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role....
